item.title: What is statistical reasoning?
item.description: Welcome to Statistical Reasoning Why do we reason statistically? What is statisical reasoning? Letâ€™s learn some more from this example: Why? Digging deeper Learn by doing this .boxed { border: 5px solid green; border-radius: 5px; padding: 50px; margin: 20px; background-color: #f8f8fa } button{ color: white; background-color: green; /* Remove background color */ border: 2px solid green; /* Border thickness, line style, and color */ */border-radius: 5px; /* Adds curve to border corners */*/ text-transform: uppercase; /* Make letters uppercase */ } function showText(y) { var button = document.
